summary: This is an email from a Victim Witness Coordinator at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, dated August 12, 2019, connecting colleagues to offer mental health treatment slots from their Counseling Center to victims in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Victim Witness Coordinator
persons.context: The sender of the email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, facilitating mental health support for victims in the Epstein case.

locations.context: Address of the United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively coordinating mental health support for victims in the Epstein case in August 2019.
The email indicates the Counseling Center had available treatment slots specifically for these victims.
The correspondence shows post-arrest victim support efforts following Jeffrey Epstein's arrest in July 2019.
